1986 Xv700 Virago
During oil change snapped oil filter bolt
Took off crankcase cover and left hand drilled it as much as I could then inserted screw extractor and snapped screw extractor while twisting. Used a dremmel and tried the flathead trick that didn't work. Tried tapping it counterclockwise and dug into the block a little bit. I don't mind retapping it that's not the problem and I can always fill the damage with a gasket sealer. But the bolt is still jammed in the block and nothing else comes to mind. Really don't want to pay a mechanic to figure it out either..
